name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: It’s Earth Day, or as it will be known in 20 years, “That Planet We Used to Live on Until We Ruined It Day.”

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: If you want to celebrate Earth Day and Easter at the same time by using marshmallow Peeps as insulation, go ahead and do it.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Earth Day is my 2nd favorite day. My 1st favorite day is Doris Day, because she taught me that it’s OK to wear pastel heels.
